title: Supply Chain Engrg III
description: Problems of coordination and collaboration along the supply chain; make-or-buy decisions; pricing and auctions; wholesale and retail channels; supply chain dynamics, including the bullwhip effect.  Distinctive supply chain issues in key economies.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ISYE 6335 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and ISYE 6336 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
